channel.title: Need help with char saving

item.title: Need help with char saving
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

Well im adding skullâ€™s to my server, and im using RuneJava 3.0b. So it handles character files threw saving.java. So i want to make it so it saves the time you have left when your skulld so u cant just log out. So heres how it looks like for regular servers

					} else if (token.equals("character-skullTimer")) {
					skullTimer = Integer.parseInt(token2);
					}
characterfile.write("character-skullTimer = ", 0, 23);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(skullTimer), 0, Integer.toString(skullTimer).length());
characterfile.newLine();

But how do i convert it so it works with rj, wich is in saving,java and looks like

      write = "(Ch)	rights	"+c.playerRights;
      file.write(write, 0, write.length());
      file.newLine();

Read full topic
